ygData.subject: Re: Best 1h blunt weapon...
ygData.msgSnippet: Have you tried the Screaming Mace?  I think it s a quest in Cazic Thul
ygData.messageBody:
Have you tried the Screaming Mace? I think it's a quest in Cazic Thul
<--yeah I can't spell) that's abuot lvl 35ish. So, if you ahve a friend, or
care to buy one. it's 8 DMG 35 Delay (if I remember correctly) and casts
Yeulp (again can't spell) randomly on you.

That's the best one I know of, but there's probably better cause otherwise
you'd use the same weapon from lvl 35-50 and that'd suck.


>From: "Teal Black" <tblack6@...>
>Reply-To: EQCheats@onelist.com
>To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
>Subject: [EQCheats] Best 1h blunt weapon...
>Date: Sun, 15 Aug 1999 09:55:51 -0700
>
>Can anyone tell me what the best 1h blunt weapon is in the game and were I
>can find it. I'm a 17 level cleric and it just seems like there are no
>good weapons that I can use at my current level.
